item.title: So i havent been on in 2 years.... wana see my progress? xD
item.dc:creator: @Slayerplayer Slayerplayer
item.description:
@Slayerplayer wrote:

dude Love your work!!

Make me one please??

Picture: A character from super smash brothers brawl. preferably ike, pit, wario, yoshi

Text: Slayerplayer

Please I want this to be really well done. Awesome detail, colours match brilliantly and just overall an epic signature!

Thank you in advance!!

Read full topic
item.source: So i havent been on in 2 years.... wana see my progress? xD

item.title: So i havent been on in 2 years.... wana see my progress? xD
item.dc:creator: @kihomura Kihomura
item.description:
@kihomura wrote:

The last one looks like goatse;

but honestly,

[quote=“eclipse245, post:8, topic:316109”]Honestly…These kind of sigs aren’t nice anymore. In my opinion.

It’s what was cool like 2-4 years ago. I think sigs that are nice now, are sigs that are clean, and look crisp. These are just anime characters with a bunch of effects. It looks like puke. They’re nice effects, and I KNOW it takes long, because I used to make sigs like these, but it’s over.[/quote]

Read full topic
item.source: So i havent been on in 2 years.... wana see my progress? xD

item.title: So i havent been on in 2 years.... wana see my progress? xD
item.dc:creator: @fezz fezz
item.description:
@fezz wrote:

[quote=“eclipse245, post:8, topic:316109”]Honestly…These kind of sigs aren’t nice anymore. In my opinion.

It’s what was cool like 2-4 years ago. I think sigs that are nice now, are sigs that are clean, and look crisp. These are just anime characters with a bunch of effects. It looks like puke. They’re nice effects, and I KNOW it takes long, because I used to make sigs like these, but it’s over.[/quote]

who says its over? Maybe for you it is, there are still many gfx communities out there making stuff like this. And also, I try to at least, but emotion into my tags, and my effects try to flow with that overall mood, i dont just slap effects on and say “ooh it luks cul”

Read full topic

item.title: So i havent been on in 2 years.... wana see my progress? xD
item.dc:creator: @eclipse245 eclipse245
item.description:
@eclipse245 wrote:

Honestly…These kind of sigs aren’t nice anymore. In my opinion.

It’s what was cool like 2-4 years ago. I think sigs that are nice now, are sigs that are clean, and look crisp. These are just anime characters with a bunch of effects. It looks like puke. They’re nice effects, and I KNOW it takes long, because I used to make sigs like these, but it’s over.

Read full topic
